# volleyball

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package helps in the manipulation of the volleyball data, including machine learning on said data.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("srmatth/volleyball")
```
